dcterms:creator: R. Hu
M. Rohrbach
T. Darrell
dcterms:description: Google-Ref contains 104560 expressions referring to 54822 objects from 26711 images selected from MS COCO. These images all contain 2 to 4 objects of the same type. In general, the expressions are longer and with richer descriptions, with an average length of 8.43 words. Although the dataset has primarily been used for referring object detection, it is also suitable for referring image segmentation, since the original MS COCO annotation contains segmentation masks.
dcterms:title: Google-Ref

dcterms:creator: L. Yu
P. Poirson
S. Yang
A. C. Berg
T. L. Berg
dcterms:description: UNC and UNC+ are based on MS COCO images. UNC consists of 142209 referring expressions for 50000 objects in 19994 images, while UNC+ consists of 141564 expressions for 49856 objects in 19992 images. The difference between the two datasets is that UNC has no restrictions on the referring expression, while UNC+ does not allow location words.
dcterms:title: UNC

dcterms:creator: L. Yu
P. Poirson
S. Yang
A. C. Berg
T. L. Berg
dcterms:description: UNC+ consists of 141564 expressions for 49856 objects in 19992 images. The dataset is collected interactively in a two-player game, and no location words are allowed in the expressions, requiring the annotator to describe the object purely by its appearance.
dcterms:title: UNC+

dcterms:creator: S. Kazemzadeh
V. Ordonez
M. Matten
T. L. Berg
dcterms:description: ReferItGame contains 130525 expressions referring to 96654 distinct objects in 19894 natural images. It includes 'stuff' segmentation masks, such as 'sky' and 'water', in addition to objects. The expressions are generally shorter and more concise due to the collection process as a two-player game.
dcterms:title: ReferItGame
